actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: A deep one archimandrite makes one claw attack and 1 unholy trident attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Unholy Trident
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) necrotic damage.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: A deep one can breathe air or water with equal ease.

special_abilities.name: Frenzied Rage
special_abilities.desc: On its next turn after a deep one archimandrite takes 10 or more damage from a single attack, it has advantage on its attacks, it adds +4 to damage, and it can make one extra unholy trident attack.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the deep one archimandrite's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: bless, revivify, sacred flame, shocking grasp, suggestion

3/day each: charm person, lightning bolt, sanctuary, shatter

1/day each: chain lightning, cone of cold, ice storm

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the deep one archimandrite fails a saving throw, it can count it as a success instead.

special_abilities.name: Lightless Depths
special_abilities.desc: A deep one hybrid priest is immune to the pressure effects of the deep ocean.

special_abilities.name: Voice of the Archimandrite
special_abilities.desc: With a ringing shout, the deep one archimandrite summons all deep ones within a mile to come to his aid. This is not a spell but a command that ocean creatures and deep ones heed willingly.
